sample.title: Remoting Call Context Sample
sample.overview: This sample shows how to add and retrieve context data that will flow with a remote call. A method called on a remote object retrieves the context data and echoes it back to the client.

customsection.name: Hosting the service in a console application

sample.customsection: Run runme.bat from a console window.

buildsteps.step:
Type nmake -a all from the command line.
C:\Program Files\Microsoft.NET\SDK\v1.1\Samples\Technologies\Remoting\Advanced\CallContext> nmake -a all

runsteps.step: Ensure that the service is hosted as described above.
